resources.string:
Mathemy challenges your math skills!

You can choose between Easy, Medium and Hard. 

Level unlocks if you score 10 or 20 correct answers in a row. 

Answer the questions by typing in your number and then press Enter. Press the C button to clear an existing answer. Questions will shift between addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.

Highscores are tracked and managed. Challenge your friends!





minSdkVersion 15 targetSdkVersion 28
